text:
@BorisJohnson Perspective 
I can remember 4 national tragedies that will haunt me and others forever. 
Hillsborough 1989 - 96 dead
Dunblane massacre 1996 - 17 dead
7/7 London Bombings 2005 - 52 dead
Ariana Grande concert 2017 - 23 dead
And yet 
Covid-19 UK - 627 dead YESTERDAY, 32,692 in total
